EmailTemplate.description: For those that HAVE NOT bought the Dummies book
EmailTemplate.name: Dummies book-NOT bought
EmailTemplate.subject: Yodle - Thank you for your interest
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in our book, “Local Online Advertising for Dummies” and for downloading a free chapter. We hope you enjoy it and will help you grow your business.
If you’d like to purchase the book, feel free to get it on amazon.com.
If you are interested in learning more about how Yodle can help you with your local online advertising campaign, feel free to call 877-276-5104 or respond to this email to schedule an appointment with one of our online specialists. You’ll get a $100 credit if you mention dummies!
Yodle info@yodle.com
Privacy Policy | Terms of Use
Yodle Inc. Headquarters 50 West 23rd Street, 4th Floor, NY, NY 10010
